      • Check_Syntax

        public static boolean Check_Syntax​(java.lang.String line,
                                   java.lang.String[] token)
        Parameters:
        line - ,token Description : Check if All valid instructions MUST contain at least one space character between every token and at least one comma character between every token argument..
        Returns:
        return false if there is any syntax error e.g no space or comma between every token
